verse: य आत्माऽपहतपाप्मा विजरो विमृत्युर्विशोको विजिघत्सोऽपिपासः सत्यकामः सत्यसंकल्पः सोऽन्वेष्टव्यः स विजिज्ञासितव्यः स सर्वाश्च लोकानाप्नोति सर्वाश्च कामान्यस्तमात्मानमनुविद्य विजानातीति ह प्रजापतिरुवाच॥
meaning: Meaning:One who is devoid of sins, free from old age, free from death, free from sorrow, free from hunger, free from thirst, desiring truth, and having true intentions, that person should be sought, that person should be known. That person attains all worlds and knows all desires within oneself. This is what Prajapati spoke.
